tha-ap136:0.3_0: As a consequence those senior monks who were junior, recently gone forth,
tha-ap136:1.2_0: a brahmin who is stupidity and folly.
tha-ap136:1.3_0: for those who sacrifice the cattle,
tha-ap136:10.1_0: You’re skilled in the fourth part of the senior monks.
tha-ap136:2.4_0: and walked back and forth on that.
tha-ap136:3.1_0: Stepping up to the path for walking meditation,
tha-ap136:4.1_0: they cut down a single flower
tha-ap136:4.2_0: a brahmin who is stupidity and folly.
tha-ap136:5.4_0: you don’t go to seven days.
tha-ap136:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap136:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mandiya.
